messages.message: @paul @shaunak @Aaron Tami we had promised second week of April for metrics and audit logs API to C1.
@Ashish was that for audit logs API or ACL api?
ACL and org support API was promised for mid-April
We should ideally club both of them in one release and deploy to them on April 17th if they are okay with that
Paul, what were Megan's expectations?
we can try that out — there were no expectations set but there are requests for “when will these things happen?”
would it be possible to do end of april for the ACL stuff?
just to build in some buffer?
there’s a good number of APIs given that they want to be able to setup a complete instance of Instabase.
(if not, that’s okay, I’ll work with @achao to get this done)
If we’re going to provide a date, I’d much rather provide one with high likelihood of getting hit without heroics than offer them a date a few weeks earlier

@Heymian please pick a date but don't change it please. I promised mid-April and now we are planning to change that. So let's decide one final date and see what they have to say. It looks bad on us to move the goal post. :slightly_smiling_face:
no worries, i didn’t realize you guys had the discussion with C1 about the deadline until a couple days ago
i think we’ll be okay — especially if we say that we’re shipping multiple things
i’m actually still not sure which APIs were promised? is it all ACL, org, teams and org settings?
Thought we were going to have a meeting/call with them about it at some point to get an idea for what they want to do/how they want to do it?
e.g. set everything in bulk? a bunch of more targetted API calls?
Just added you to an email thread with their requirements
here’s the full dump from the meeting: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1q_HBZ5smn_MxVKGJCfbGRBnyRt1xI8ahz1KSw3rT2JY/edit
sorry it’s not that structured, havent had a chance to clean it up
oh this is helpful. reading!
